DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine efficacy gemcitabine , cisplatin , radiotherapy , term 1-year survival , patient locally advanced pancreatic cancer . - Determine toxicity regimen patient . - Determine quality life patient treat regimen . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients undergo radiotherapy daily five day week 5.5 week . Patients receive gemcitabine IV 30 minute follow cisplatin IV 1 hour twice week first 3 week radiotherapy . Beginning 4 week completion radiotherapy , patient receive gemcitabine IV 30 minute day 1 , 8 , 15 . Treatment repeat every 28 day total 3 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Quality life assess baseline , completion radiotherapy , completion chemotherapy , 3 month completion therapy . Patients follow every 3 month 2 year every 6 month 1 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 20-47 patient accrue study within 12-28 month .
